title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Peer Feedback-Based Language Learning Awareness Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners understand the structure and criteria of peer feedback and can apply it with 85% accuracy in language projects.
Learners perform the role of feedback providers in two or more feedback sessions and suggest specific improvements in content organization and expression.
Learners perceive the impact of peer feedback on their learning awareness changes at or above a 4-point scale (out of 5) through pre- and post-surveys.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
